Ingredients.1: 3 tablespoons dry barbeque rub, or more as needed

Ingredients.2: 1 (3 1/2) pound bone-in pork shoulder blade roast

Ingredients.5: 0.75 cup barbeque sauce, or as needed

Ingredients.6: 1 salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 210 degrees F (100 degrees C).

Directions.2: Sprinkle dry rub generously on all sides of pork roast and place meat into a heavy pan or Dutch oven.

Directions.3: Pour 1/4 teaspoon of liquid smoke flavoring into each of two 6-ounce ramekins; fill ramekins with 1/2 cup water each. Place ramekins into the Dutch oven on either side of the roast. Place lid onto Dutch oven.

Directions.4: Roast pork in the preheated oven until very tender, 12 hours. Remove roast from Dutch oven, place onto a work surface (such as a cutting board), and separate the meat from the bone using your fingers. Discard any large pieces of fat.

Directions.5: Roughly chop pork with a large knife or cleaver; drizzle with 3/4 cup barbeque sauce. Season with salt and black pepper.

Directions.6: Spread about 1 tablespoon barbeque sauce onto each bun and pile pork on buns to serve.
